title: CBC Life
text:
'Clown' is one of those costumes so quintessentially Halloween that you can make it work any year. But even if you've put on the oversized shoes and squeaky red nose before, it's safe to say you've never done it quite like this. We love this carnival-inspired makeup tutorial from Julia Dantas because it takes an artful approach to the classic clown aesthetic, and delivers two distinct looks so duos can dress up together. Check out the video below to see how it's done, and scroll down to see the products Julia used to perfect this look.

Makeup maven Julia Dantas shows how to nail these complementary looks that’ll get you circus-ready. 7:45

Here's what Julia used for this tutorial:
